name: Dana Byerly
intro: I'm Dana Byerly, a boring designer with a focus on keeping things simple. I enjoy coding and I design in the browser. I've worked on the web since 1996. For the past 16 years I've worked in the enterprise space. It's been awhile since I've had a proper web presence beyond my side projects, and the apparent "return of the personal site" seemed like as good a time as any.
